name: Here the World: The Video Game
name_original: Here the World: The Video Game
description:
Aliens have invaded Earth in search of two humans to save their home-world!
Here the World musicians, Scythe and Johnny are on their way to a show when they are suddenly warped to another world.


Take control of Scythe and Johnny to solve puzzles and complete silly quests in this family-friendly adventure.


    • An Original Soundtrack by Here the World
    • Controller Support
    • Fun Puzzles
    • Easy to Beat | Pick Up and Play
    • Short Gameplay (20-40 Minutes to Finish)
    • Multiple Endings



    Unfortunately RPG Maker does not support Mac.
    If you want to play the game with a Mac you can use a Windows emulator.
    We recommend WineBottler, it is safe and easy to use.
    You can download it here.
